#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){

    map <string,int> m;
    map <int,string> a;

    int n; string s;
    cin >> n;
    while(n--){
        cin >> s;
        m[s]++;
        if(a.find(m[s])==a.end())
            a[m[s]]=s;
    }

    for(map<int,string>::iterator i=a.begin();i!=a.end();i++)
    cout << i->first << " " << i->second << endl;

    return 0;
}
